name: 🐼 MEIZU ‘Panda’  VR 3D Glasses 眼鏡
description:
For a long time, MEIZU’s mascot was called ‘Vajra Panda’, which means ‘a cute but tough panda’, so I thought of designing a VR glasses in its name, and it's in line with the trend called ‘Guochao’ in China.

Let's press "Like❤️" button. I will enlarge or update my design file anytime and you will see and duplicate it. No bad, right?


以魅族的「金剛熊貓」為原型設計的 VR 紙板眼鏡，放到現在來說應該叫做「國潮」設計吧？

按下“❤️”，我會隨時更新這個設計文件，也方便你隨時查看和複製，大家共同進步。


My Figma Community Page: figma.com/@bearbearwong

My Behance Page: behance.net/bearbearwong

My Website: bearbearwong.github.io
